verses.verse: The words <S%H1697><s%> of Nehemiah <S%H5166><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hachaliah. <S%H2446><s%> And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass in the month <S%H2320><s%> Chisleu, <S%H3691><s%> in the twentieth <S%H6242><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> as I was in Shushan <S%H7800><s%> the palace, <S%H1002><s%>

That Hanani, <S%H2607><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of my brothers, <S%H251><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> he and certain men <S%H582><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%> and I asked <S%H7592><s%> them concerning <S%H5921><s%> the Jews <S%H3064><s%> that had escaped, <S%H6413><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were left <S%H7604><s%> of the captivity, <S%H7628><s%> and concerning <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> to me, The remnant <S%H7604><s%> that are left <S%H7604><s%> of the captivity <S%H7628><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> in the province <S%H4082><s%> are in great <S%H1419><s%> affliction <S%H7451><s%> and reproach: <S%H2781><s%> the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> also is broken <S%H6555><s%> down, and the gates <S%H8179><s%> thereof are burned <S%H3341><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when I heard <S%H8085><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> that I sat <S%H3427><s%> down and wept, <S%H1058><s%> and mourned <S%H56><s%> certain days, <S%H3117><s%> and fasted, <S%H6684><s%> and prayed <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%>

And said, <S%H559><s%> I beseech <S%H577><s%> you, O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> that keeps <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and mercy <S%H2617><s%> for them that love <S%H157><s%> him and observe <S%H8104><s%> his commandments: <S%H4687><s%>

Let your ear <S%H241><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> be attentive, <S%H7183><s%> and your eyes <S%H5869><s%> open, <S%H6605><s%> that you may hear <S%H8085><s%> the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of your servant, <S%H5650><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I pray <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you now, <S%H3117><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night, <S%H3915><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> your servants, <S%H5650><s%> and confess <S%H3034><s%> the sins <S%H2403><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you: both I and my father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> have sinned. <S%H2398><s%>

We have dealt very corruptly <S%H2254><s%> against you, and have not kept <S%H8104><s%> the commandments, <S%H4687><s%> nor the statutes, <S%H2706><s%> nor the judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you commanded <S%H6680><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> I beseech <S%H4994><s%> you, the word <S%H1697><s%> that you commanded <S%H6680><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> If you transgress, <S%H4603><s%> I will scatter <S%H6327><s%> you abroad <S%H6327><s%> among the nations: <S%H5971><s%>

But if you turn <S%H7725><s%> to me, and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them; though <S%H518><s%> there were of you cast <S%H5080><s%> out to the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> part of the heaven, <S%H8064><s%> yet will I gather <S%H6908><s%> them from there, <S%H8033><s%> and will bring <S%H935><s%> them to the place <S%H4725><s%> that I have chosen <S%H970><s%> to set <S%H7931><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

Now these <S%H1992><s%> are your servants <S%H5650><s%> and your people, <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you have redeemed <S%H6299><s%> by your great <S%H1419><s%> power, <S%H3581><s%> and by your strong <S%H2389><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

O LORD, <S%H136><s%> I beseech <S%H577><s%> you, let now <S%H4994><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> be attentive <S%H7183><s%> to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of your servant, <S%H5650><s%> and to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of your servants, <S%H5650><s%> who desire <S%H2655><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> your name: <S%H8034><s%> and prosper, <S%H6743><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, your servant <S%H5650><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> and grant <S%H5414><s%> him mercy <S%H7356><s%> in the sight <S%H6440><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> man. <S%H376><s%> For I was the king's <S%H4428><s%> cupbearer. <S%H4945><s%>
